title: Test Multi-Agent Safe Storage - Visual Demonstration
description:
This is a test devlog entry created to demonstrate the new conflict-free timestamp-based ID generation system. This entry should receive a timestamp-based ID instead of a sequential one, proving that multiple AI agents can now work simultaneously without merge conflicts.

The new system:
- Uses timestamp + random suffix for unique IDs
- Eliminates race conditions in index.json
- Allows concurrent devlog creation
- Maintains backward compatibility

context.businessContext: Testing the newly implemented multi-agent safe storage system to verify it works correctly in the real application environment.
context.technicalContext: This test validates the timestamp-based ID generation implemented in packages/core/src/storage/json-storage.ts. The generated ID should be significantly larger than the previous sequential IDs (which were in the 90s range).
acceptanceCriteria: Entry receives a timestamp-based ID (13+ digits)
Entry appears correctly in the web interface
